title: PayRam
description: PayRam empowers businesses to accept secure, anonymous no-KYC crypto payments. You keep full control of your payments, no middlemen, and operate globally with zero third-party risks. Our decentralized payment gateway ensures global lowest fees (as low as 0.5%), fraud-proof blockchain security, bypass traditional bans and complete data security and privacy. Ideal for high risk businesses navigating complex challenges in high-risk industries. Take control of your payments today with PayRam.
